title: Amazon's Zoox to begin offering robotaxi rides to employees in Las Vegas
excerpt: Amazon's autonomous vehicle unit Zoox announced it will begin offering robotaxi rides to employees in Las Vegas, marking a significant step toward commercial deployment.

title: Waymo cars spotted around Seattle and Bellevue
excerpt: Waymo's autonomous vehicles have been spotted testing on roads around Seattle and Bellevue, suggesting potential expansion to the Pacific Northwest.

title: Waymo eyes San Jos√© airport as Tesla and Zoox gear up for FIFA and Super Bowl
excerpt: As major sporting events approach, autonomous vehicle companies are positioning themselves for high-profile deployments at key transportation hubs.

title: The lab behind Waymo and Google Glass that wants to reshape your life
excerpt: A deep dive into Google's X lab, the moonshot factory responsible for breakthrough technologies including Waymo's autonomous driving system.

title: Tesla and Waymo are gunning for a coveted airport contract
excerpt: Major autonomous vehicle companies are competing for lucrative airport transportation contracts, signaling the maturation of the robotaxi market.

title: Lyft's modest robotaxi launch highlights growing gap with Uber and Waymo
excerpt: Lyft's conservative approach to robotaxi deployment contrasts sharply with the aggressive expansion strategies of competitors Uber and Waymo.

title: Uber partners with Momenta to test L4 driverless cars in Munich
excerpt: Uber's partnership with Chinese autonomous driving company Momenta brings Level 4 autonomous vehicles to European roads for the first time.
